name: Focus Point Perfect Gleam Lipgloss - 111: 7 Stunning Benefits of This Ultimate Shine Enhancer
description:
Focus Point Perfect Gleam Lipgloss - 111: The Ultimate Shine for Your Lips

Discover the luxurious Focus Point Perfect Gleam Lipgloss - 111, a premium lip product designed to give your lips the perfect combination of color, shine, and nourishment. This exceptional lipgloss delivers a high-impact glossy finish that makes your lips look fuller and more defined with just one application. 💋

The Focus Point Perfect Gleam Lipgloss - 111 features a non-sticky formula that glides on smoothly, providing comfortable wear throughout the day. Unlike other glosses that feel tacky or heavy, this innovative formula feels lightweight while delivering maximum shine that lasts for hours.

Key Features of Focus Point Perfect Gleam Lipgloss - 111

  • Long-lasting shine without stickiness
  • Hydrating formula with vitamin E and natural oils
  • Subtle shimmer particles for dimension
  • Comfortable wear with no feathering
  • Versatile shade that complements multiple skin tones
  • Convenient applicator for precise application
Product Information
Size 8ml
Gender Unisex
Product Type Lipgloss
Finish High Shine
Brand Name Focus Point

The History Behind Focus Point Cosmetics

Focus Point has been creating innovative beauty products since 2010, with a commitment to quality ingredients and stunning results. Their Perfect Gleam lipgloss line represents the culmination of years of research into creating the perfect balance of shine, color, and comfort. The shade 111 is one of their bestselling colors, offering a versatile hue that works beautifully for both everyday wear and special occasions.

Why Choose Focus Point Perfect Gleam Lipgloss - 111?

The Focus Point Perfect Gleam Lipgloss - 111 stands out in the crowded lipgloss market because of its exceptional formula that doesn't compromise on any aspect of performance. The perfect balance of pigmentation means you get noticeable color without sacrificing the glass-like shine that makes lipgloss so appealing. 💄

Whether worn alone for a subtle enhancement or layered over lipstick for dramatic impact, this lipgloss delivers consistent results every time. The precision applicator ensures you can define your lip line perfectly while distributing the product evenly.

Frequently Asked Question: How long does Focus Point Perfect Gleam Lipgloss last?

The Focus Point Perfect Gleam Lipgloss - 111 typically lasts 3-4 hours on the lips before needing reapplication. The formula is designed to maintain its shine longer than traditional glosses, though eating and drinking will naturally reduce its longevity. For maximum staying power, apply a thin layer of lip liner underneath and blot lips before application.

Complete your makeup collection with these other fantastic Focus Point products:

  • Focus Point Matte Revolution Lipstick - Perfect for pairing under your gloss
  • Focus Point Precision Lip Liner - Create definition before applying your gloss
  • Focus Point Hydrating Lip Balm - Prep your lips for smooth gloss application
  • Focus Point Gentle Makeup Remover - Easily remove your lipgloss at the end of the day
